title: Patrick Bond: The Urgent Need for Climate Reparations
itunes:title: Patrick Bond: The Urgent Need for Climate Reparations
description: Patrick Bond, sociology professor at the University of Johannesburg, South Africa, discusses the urgent need for climate reparations for Africa, in light of the COP26 climate summit, and why market solutions will not work to address the problems Africa is currently facing. Part 2 of 2.
